description:
Local reference context at a variant position.

The annotation gives ten reference bases each to the left and right of the variant start and the start base for a total of 21 reference bases. Start position is defined as one base before indels. For example, the reference context AAAAAAAAAACTTTTTTTTTT would apply to a SNV variant context with ref allele C and alt allele G as well as to a deletion variant context with ref allele CT and alt allele C.
name: ReferenceBases
